website_summaries.verdict: This affordable harness offers buyers an inexpensive price tag for small, medium, and large dogs.
pros: Sizing options include small, medium, large, and extra-large dogs
Padding is removable depending on dog's needs and comfort
cons: Harness is troublesome to keep in place

customer_reviews.title: I returned complex garbage/crap from Asia that was like a rubic's cube to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: After trying overly complex harnesses etc. ... we discovered the simplest and cheapest solution for assisting our Aussie ... and you're looking at it. Goes on quick, comes off quick, you walk your elder dog and lift slightly when needed for support. Is not intimidating to the dog, THEY know it helps. I returned complex garbage/crap from Asia that was like a rubic's cube to get on and off ... product looked great but was horrible to deal with. Duh, simpler is almost always better.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for supporting arthritic dog!
customer_reviews.text: Game changer for my arthritic 12 year old lab. Before I bought this I was using a towel to support her arthritic back legs. It hurt my back and didn’t work very well. This product is comfortable for both of us. I can give her the extra support she needs (especially squating to do her buisness and on stairs) without hurting my back and she can still do some so she’s not loosing all of her muscle mass! Update 1/6/2019 We’ve used this 2-3 times a day for a year and it’s still amazing. The Velcro is slightly worn but otherwise it’s still as good as it was a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Socksrocks

customer_reviews.title: Truly a life hanger for our elderly dog.
customer_reviews.text: Our 11 year old, 73 lb dog has severe hip issues and had gotten to the point where he was having trouble standing from a prone position. I found this Lepark dog sling and thought I would give it a try. Truly a lifesaver! When we manually helped him up it caused him a lot of pain, however, since we started using this sling he is doing so much better. Thank you for truly a great product! Rou
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and comfortable for dog
customer_reviews.text: We have 45-50 LBS very active 4 yeas old Border Collie why had a surgery for his dislocated hip. Veterinariany technician advisered me to use towel around his belly for a few week for support . I got a sling and it’s was a life saver - fits perfect, easily adjust - easy wash after Jake peed a few times on it . Great product. We don’t need I’d now but I can see in a future as Jake will get older and I really see starting use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivetta K Lapkina

customer_reviews.title: Great product and Outstanding Customer Service!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a blessing for my 14 year old Lab and I! I needed this to help him get up and down the stairs to my third floor apartment. It has been a HUGE help to say the least!!! I also like to thank Lepark’s OUTSTANDING customer service! I originally ordered an XL, which turned out to be too big so I contacted them via email for an exchange. They responded promptly, sending out TWO different sizes just to make sure I found the best fit and without actually having to return anything!! Now, that’s going ABOVE AND BEYOND!! Overall, a great product and experience! Highly Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal E.

customer_reviews.title: Needs a chest strap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sling to assist our 13-year old blind/deaf/arthritic dog manage the stairs. The size chart was a bit off for our dog, but the customer service was excellent in helping us find the correct fit. The sling works great going up stairs, but slips toward the dog’s hind quarters going down stairs or if the dog walks ahead of us. I suggest adding a Velcro chest strap to make the sling more secure.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: THEY have to be ready!!
customer_reviews.text: The truth is... I like this sling much better than my 4 legged boy does! I am currently sticking with his harness ... we bought stair strips to help keep him from sliding on the ceramic tile stairs inside the house ( which was why I initially bought the harness) so for now he is good inside and I keep him a a short leash on the outside steps, which are also slick. I kept the sling because I know that it will eventually be needed. Until then I’ll let him do it his way... with his harness and a short leash outside! I ❤️ My 4-legged boy! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bunches up and applies all weight on stomach.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't find this very helpful for my 13 year old 100 lb lab. It would bunch up cut and into her stomach. I tried it several times and so did my husband. We are around 6 feet tall and found we had to hunch over to use.
customer_reviews.author: S. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Helping my dog and the next day delivery really helped out
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dog sling because my dog's hind legs have given out on her and I am unable to pick her up because of her size I ordered the dog sling with a next day delivery and I am just so thankful that it did come in the next day it is helping her out and it is helping me to get her outside when she needs to go thank you so very much I do like this product and I am thankful for the next day delivery that has helped out so so very much thank you
customer_reviews.author: Bet28

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My dog was 100% healthy and had a freak accident while running in the backyard. She slipped a disc in her back and lost the use of her back legs for a couple weeks. I got this sling on day 3 to replace the towel I was using to hold her up. after a couple days, she would get excited when she saw me coming with the sling. She loved it, and therefore so did I. I'm glad to say now that it sits in a drawer unused for the time being.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleena F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Our Dog went Paralyzed in his back legs and you can get a wheelchair for dogs but that's really only good when we take him for a walk. Then at night or anytime I just need to move him I use this Lepark Dog Sling. It works Great! I am so happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: stpetesunset

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sm/md but it was a bit to snug contacted the company and they sent me the next size up very quickly! The design is very simple so easy to get on and off no confusing straps like others ive bought and return. I wasnt sure if the vecro was going to hold up my dog but it is quite strong and doesnt even move while holding him up. Good design much cheaper than what chewy.com wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Donato

customer_reviews.title: What I needed for my dog who tore his cruciate ligament
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this after my dog had a cruciate tear. I did wish it had more padding, but the price point is good and better than using a towel. I underestimated how chubby my boy was and their customer service responded quickly and shipped the larger size. Max isn’t a fan of it, but he doesn’t like his crate or e-collar either. It does the job at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: Lepark Dog Sling highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend the Lepark Dog Sling. Our 10 year old springer spaniel sprained her back leg and could barely walk. We bought this sling and used it so she could still go on the walks that she loved and have her body supported. We used the sling for almost 7 weeks until she finally healed and can walk on her own. I also found it helpful to use if she is in a situation with slippery floors since she has muscle weakness in her back legs. We bought two sizes. The wider one seemed to give her body size more support and seemed more comfortable. We kept the other one also.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful for older dogs or post surgery.
customer_reviews.text: Saved our backs and our dogs walking post hip surgery. Was able to help the dog walk slowly outside and slowly rehab her into walking. Also did rehab with dog by buying inflatable hot tub (through amazon) and working very gently in the water, holding her up as she gently moved the surgery leg.
customer_reviews.author: veronica Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog's waist and it was about 26", which indicated that I should buy the XL, so I did. This thing is seriously huge. If I close it around her waist it has a ton of extra room. I really should have gone with the L, but it still works fine, I just don't bother closing it on her. I was going to exchange it but it wasn't really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great for helping up (and) down stairs
customer_reviews.text: We have an older Sheltie who is having a hard time getting up (and down) stairs due to his vertigo spells (aka old dog syndrome). We bought the large size so we could easily drape it under his belly without making him uncomfortable, as he does not like to be "manhandled." It was very easy to use by just holding the handle up and forward and guiding our little guy up the stairs. It allowed him to do the walking but with a little help and to maintain his dignity with the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this. Well made and comfortable for the dog. Bought for the Labrador, but it can be used on about any size dog.
customer_reviews.author: CLB FWT

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. The interfacing is paper. The handles are flimsy. Very disappointed. The Velcro did not hold my 70 lb dog. I would not recommend for a large dog. Maybe it is ok for a little one.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie's mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money.
customer_reviews.text: So I have a 13 year old girl that has old dog syndrome aka vertigo. When she has these attacks, she can't walk, gets nauseous, panics because she doesn't understand. This works great for a lift assist for a 50+ lb dog. My vet even admired it. I do wish it was wider but still worth the money. Easy to use. Very important as if you can't easily put it on your dog, it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought because our dog had acl surgery. However it Kept sliding up. Not secure at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My dog is in the early stage of degenerative myelopathy, and he needs help with stairs and ramps. The sling is nicely padded on the inside and seems very sturdy. Make sure you measure your dog before ordering. The pad tends to slip toward the hind legs, which is fine, because that's where my dog needs the support.
customer_reviews.author: Pam P.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Built well and works great for my 68 lb Doberman when we have to visit the vet and walk on their tile floors. My only real complaint is the seems on the inside are a bit rough since it is vinyl, and it agitates the skin on her belly and inner thighs. I am going to need to sew a fleece cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: That One Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it 3 stars because our lab is a “large” dog and we got her that size and it’s really tight. We can lift her but she needs to lose a little bit of weight for it to not be uncomfortable. But it is durable!
customer_reviews.author: Dana W.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Product was much smaller than I expected. I measured my dog before I ordered to make sure I got the right size, but the Velcro barely touches. My dog hates it too, but I expected that. The quality seems good. I would've been happy with it if only it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Product Review

customer_reviews.title: Small and slippery.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a large for a 55 lb. dog and it was too small in length and width, which in addition to the “slippery” inner lining made this sling slip forward and backward when trying to assist our dog on any kind of incline. It was of some slight value when giving support on a flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: Purchase Person

customer_reviews.title: Best Post Op Dog Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Rhodesian ridgeback needed to have bilateral knee surgery. The ortho vet recommended finding a dog sling to help post op. I am so glad that I did! Not only does this keep her steady, it’s helpful to slow her down as well. She is on post op day 4 and I’m not sure how this would have gone without it! It’s also very helpful for potty trips!! If your dog is having any kind of hind leg surgery or has difficulty walking, you need this!
customer_reviews.author: Amie E. Schell

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to measure correctly for the size you will need.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our dachshund who had undergone surgery for a ruptured disk in his neck. He is a full size dachshund and heavy to carry. This sling is very helpful in lifting him, which we will need to do until he is healed. It is well made and works as we had hoped. We had a problem in the size of the one we ordered and the company was very quick to respond for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: 2A Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium for our 18 pound miniature poodle, who has Cushing's Syndrome and a bit of a pot belly, making it hard to figure what size to get. The product itself is quality and will do the job, but we should have ordered a Large. We emailed the seller direct, explained our problem, and they gladly and immediately sent us a Large with zero hassle. I'd give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Pete on the Coast

customer_reviews.title: ease of putting on
customer_reviews.text: what a great product heavy duty and easy to help my 10 year old golden retriever get up on her back legs as she has problems walking her legs are weak . I am very satisfied customer
customer_reviews.author: M. Snell

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product was just what I needed to assist my elderly golden retriever with steps. My only advice is to consider that the sling runs a bit on the small side. The first sling I received was too small even though I ordered the listed size for my dogs weight. I contacted customer service and they could not have been more responsive. They immediately sent a replacement sling in the next size up and it fits perfectly. Good product, reasonably priced, and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so I am glad I have it in case I need it for ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the sling as promised. I bought for possible use after I had to have my dog's leg amputated. She did so well, I didn't have to use it. I do have an older dog that is having hip problems, so I am glad I have it in case I need it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The size may be missed marked
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium and it did not even meet around my little dog. I sent it back and ordered a large which is way too big. I think the medium was actually a small but it was marked medium
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product to have just in case...
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered the wrong size. The company responded immediately and sent me the correct size. I got the sling because my pup just had ACL repair surgery and I thought this would Help her with the steps for the first few days. It did the trick. Having large breed dogs its good to have this in case there is an emergency and you need to try and lift your dog. This will make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This came in so handy when my senior dog had her first bout with vestibular "old dog" disease. We have back issues and it was a life saver when we had to guide her up and down stairs to go outside.
customer_reviews.author: J Sorbi

customer_reviews.title: Help for you dog!
customer_reviews.text: This sling is a great product when dealing with a dog that is unstable or losing function in their legs. Our golden is losing use of her. rear legs and we needed a way to assist her. Thank goodness for a product to do this! The company service was outstanding. This is a hard time for us and they helped solve a big problem for us.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product, sits snug around my dogs frame allowing me to give my dog the proper support he needs due to his hind leg issues. Highly recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sling, but unfortunately didn't really use as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sling, but unfortunately didn't really use as I thought I would. Well made material. I don't really like that it wraps near my dogs genitals, so I avoided using it for that reason as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great aid after knee surgery!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 68 lb lab/pointer mix that had to have knee surgery (fluxating patella repair). This worked great at helping me get him up and helping him walk around after the procedure. I only needed to use for about a week as Eli eventually figured out how to get up and walk around on his own, but definitely very useful for that first week and will come in handy when he has his other knee repaired in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The large size fits my elder 75 pound Ridgeback female very nicely. She thinks it’s weird but wore it on her walk. Very nicely made and reassuring to know I can help her if she needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive dog sling made of good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our 13 year old Australian Cattle Dog. He has been having issues for the past year with his hind legs. I was very impressed by the quality of materials for the sling. This works good for walks in order to keep the dog somewhat active. If your looking for something to lift the dog then I would recommend something that supports the front and hind legs. I can use the sling to lift his hind legs and then use my other arm to lift him from the front and that seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for TPLO Surgery
customer_reviews.text: Dog had knee surgery and this worked well to help him over stairs during the first few weeks after surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Webic

customer_reviews.title: Helped our lame old dog - til the end.
customer_reviews.text: This is helpful for a dog with no back end support. We used it along with a front permanent harness so we could lift and help support our dog in his final year.
customer_reviews.author: Gurka

customer_reviews.title: Helps my 145lb baby boy with his arthritis
customer_reviews.text: We have a 145lb 10 year old Cane Corso. This is great for those cold winter days when his arthritis sets in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Godley

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for my dog best friend!
customer_reviews.text: So incredibly impressed by the customer service of this company and the quality of the product. Sizing runs a little small, but the team immediately helped to rectify the issue and got me the size I needed (got a large for my 35 lb dog). So happy that I know have a product to help my dog as his back legs do not have the strength that they used to. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Gloistein

customer_reviews.title: I have a corgi with a bad hip. This doing is great for helping her ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a corgi with a bad hip. This doing is great for helping her up the stairs. The only downfall is that it slips under her belly when going down the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot smaller than the picture. I put it on my beagle and it slid right down his back when I grabbed to assist. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: he acted like it was pinching his privates
customer_reviews.text: He couldn’t tolerate wearing it. When lifting him, he acted like it was pinching his privates. Might have been ok if I was trying to keep his weight off the front legs and it was around his chest, but not great for the back.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Can't really rate
customer_reviews.text: Our beloved Dallie died before we got this, so we returned it. It is a great idea, and looked to be well made, but I never used it.
customer_reviews.author: S. & K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Our dog needed help going up stairs. This device came in handy to give her a boost. I's buy it again
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit around my dog but I’m sure it would’ve been fine to use if it was the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helps in supporting the dog who cannot use her hind legs
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: A good value to help your ailing pet.
customer_reviews.text: Great aid for helping my older Labrador who was having difficulty walking. We used it for a few weeks and now she's back on her own power, but great help for very reasonable price. Could be just a tad bit wider to spread the weight distribution a little better, but it was adequate and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Lardner

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful customer support
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this dog sling, but unfortunately it was too small for my dog. Customer support was wonderful, and they promptly sent me a larger size. Very pleased with them and the product!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mc Wright

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made product. The S/M was too small for our border collie. They promptly replaced for free. Sadly, our dog passed away and we could not use it. They allowed us to keep/donate the replacement and they will accept the 1st one back for return. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D. Daron

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It serves it's purpose but was way to difficult with my dog!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Massey

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well.
customer_reviews.text: Really great. even though my dog hated it. She tore both acl's and was crippled, she was afraid of it. As soon as she started being more mobile I donated to a no kill animal shelter.
customer_reviews.author: m bauer

customer_reviews.title: Not for male dogs.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t use it at all, it doesn’t work for male dogs. They should say it.
customer_reviews.author: Anamaria Herdz

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a suitcase for your dog
customer_reviews.text: I have a lazy dog , feels entitled and that “walking”is over rated. Now I can just pick her up like a suitcase. #dogsarelazy
customer_reviews.author: Yup its me

customer_reviews.title: Do not leave on pet! Be sure to inspect your pet for  sores
customer_reviews.text: This worked great to assist my 80 lb. retriever who has DM. However, I left it on him for two days and he developed sores near his penis. Make sure you only leave this on your pet for transport assist ONLY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have 14 year old lab mix with arthritic in her back legs. The hardness helps in lifting her up and down steps. It is comfortable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph P. Cosenza

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. For our dogs skinny waist this didn't work at all. Used two t-shirts tired together instead and got 1000x better result.
customer_reviews.author: Jon F.

customer_reviews.title: im a senior my self and this helps me to help her get down the stairs without putting unnecessary strain on my back
customer_reviews.text: my senior dog is 14. and she weighs 72 lbs.. im a senior my self and this helps me to help her get down the stairs without putting unnecessary strain on my back...
customer_reviews.author: bevnick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to take on and off and has been a huge help with my old Dane
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Pickett

customer_reviews.title: For back leg assist only
customer_reviews.text: Slides doesn't stay in one spot where I need it on the chest. Good for rear only....on a 45lb dog boxer
customer_reviews.author: Casey Smith

customer_reviews.title: sling
customer_reviews.text: order by size, way to big, had to send back, and had no problem
customer_reviews.author: Highlander65

customer_reviews.title: Good product, on-time delivery
customer_reviews.text: Works well to help my elder dog up the stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a good sling without the PetSmart markup
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my 150 pound Rottie after her surgery
customer_reviews.author: 8hammy

customer_reviews.title: My little pup had a surgery on her rear right ...
customer_reviews.text: My little pup had a surgery on her rear right leg and cant put weight on it. This helped with her recovery when she needed to go outside and potty, and also helped her with rehabilitation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My older dog recently hurt his back and can’t put weight on his back legs this is perfect for him and us to assist him to walk around in the yard
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Makes getting up the stairs easier for all
customer_reviews.text: The harness works so well! My golden retriever has trouble with stairs sometimes. Even my 10 year old can help her up the stairs using this!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Too Large
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because it was too large
customer_reviews.author: Toy

customer_reviews.title: Not the best choice
customer_reviews.text: My lab is NOT pleased with this... also hard to use
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Its Okay...
customer_reviews.text: It slips around, does not stay in place, but otherwise it works.
customer_reviews.author: lululec

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: well made but I will return it just slides around on my dog - perhaps a size issue?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made but unfortunately the small/medium was too small for our 25 pound rotund pug, and the large was too big. Customer service was great, quick response and turn around when sending another size.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Flood

customer_reviews.title: Prositive Review
customer_reviews.text: I like it and use it to support my dog,
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Sprout

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this product because my boxer was having acl surgery ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product because my boxer was having acl surgery. It worked well to lift her rear so she wouldnt put weight on her hind leg.
customer_reviews.author: Denise B.

customer_reviews.title: Great to have when you need something to help your dog up
customer_reviews.text: When my 88 lb dog had to have ACL surgery, this really helped me get her up to out. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: sissy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this!! Fits my dog well and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Meelock

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like it said and worked perfectly for my dog after ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks exactly like it said and worked perfectly for my dog after she had surgery for a torn ACL.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Kliemisch

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit
customer_reviews.text: There is not enough velcro to fit the sling snuggly around the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Rise

customer_reviews.title: Great sling
customer_reviews.text: It bunches up under my pup but other than that, it’s great! Does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Munoz

customer_reviews.title: The LePark sling is a wonderful product. It is well made and definitely aided ...
customer_reviews.text: The LePark sling is a wonderful product. It is well made and definitely aided in my dog’s recovery from leg surgery. The service was exceptional. Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.author: barbara Reiff

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was well made and the company stands behind their product. They even have a note in the package to contact them directly if there are any problems! Five star rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sling is well made and has been very helpful lifting my senior dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Harness
customer_reviews.text: We have a 85 lb. 12 year oldLab that shattered her femur inside her left side back leg. . Not sure how she managed to break her leg. $3300.00 later we have to take her out side using this awesum lifting harness to keep. Her from stumbling. This harness works very good and .is very easy to install and to control her with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe get a different one.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best design. Handle sticks to velcro. The handle is sewn into the area where the velcro overlaps, creating an issue for getting the Velcro areas to completely attach. It pulls the overlap areas apart when you use the handles to lift the dog. Not really something you can leave on the dog to help throughout the day. Cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Tookind

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stay on. I got this to help ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay on. I got this to help my elderly Pitbull walk up the stairs and it just slides down to his bottom and then falls down his legs and he ends up tripping over it. Doesn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay in place - not comfortable for pup.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has severe arthritis, and needs some help walking sometimes. I got this to give her a little extra assistance, but she’s not a fan. It slips when we’re using it, and usually ends up bunched up around her tummy, right in front of her back legs. Can’t be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CottageDweller

customer_reviews.title: It helps for therapy for the dog
customer_reviews.text: I use this sling as a brace to help my Dog walk better. In combination with her joint vitamins and medication, this sling has helped her immensely. It's been three weeks and she 's walking much better.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: I think it'll work well.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my dog to help support him when his vestibular disease flares up and he can't stand or walk on his own. It hasn't happened since the sling arrived, but I think it will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barth

product_meta.title: Lepark Dog Sling with Handle for Canine Aid, Veterinarian Approved Dog Lift Harness for Rehabilitation
feature_bullets: DIMENSION: Our lifting support pad is 22 inches long X 6.7 inches wide and is appropriate for dogs weighing 15-45 pounds. NOTE: Measuring your dog’s body measurements before ordering this sling in order to avoid the unsuitable purchase.

END BACK PAIN: Our sling can help your dogs with loss of stability caused by joint injuries, arthritis or weak hind legs or joints. It will make you become able to give your dog a lift without bending over. It is a great replacement to your traditional dog sling carrier when supporting your dog’s back legs. You can easily give your dog’s rear legs a lift and protect it’s back while doing so.

SOFT & COMFORTABLE: This sling’s grip equipped with removable padding is perfect for protecting your hand for easy comfortable use. Our soft sling is comfortable for your dogs to wear and is ideal for older senior dog walk and climb if suffering from arthritis or injured.

STRONG & DURABLE: Our high quality sling is heavy duty and made to hold the weight of medium to large dogs such as Border Collie, Samoyed, Husky, Labrador, Golden Retriever and similar breed of dogs. You just need to CHECK whether our dog lift harness’ DIMENSION suits for your dog or not before ordering .

EASY TO USE & CARE: You just need to take a few seconds to put on your dog by applying the pad to the chest or near the hips back legs. When cleaning the dog lift, you just need to simply put it in the washing machine and let it air dry. NOTE: DO NOT machine dry.
